response.overview: Secluded is a thriller/drama film about a family who moved out to the middle of nowhere to seemingly get away from the busy city life.  However, in reality, the family is terrorized by an abusive father, Steven(Brian O'Bryant) who constantly puts down his wife, Linda(Jaymee Vowell), son George(Zack Adams) and daughter Katie(Liberty Grace Johnson).  As the abuse intensifies, Katie starts to manifest or dream a dangerous cult into existence, led by a twisted leader(Madeline Smith).  When Katie runs into Samantha(Madison Sturges), who seemingly tries to help, she is led into a dark world she never knew existed.
response.tagline: Evil lives within a family, who moves to the middle of nowhere and abuse intensifies with each passing day.
response.title: Secluded
